long_description: Our most wind-resistant REI-brand fleece, the men's REI Windbrake Thermal Fleece vest can handle everything from hiking to snow sports in the backcountry. Breathable heavyweight polyester fleece has an abrasion-resistant outer face, a warmth-retaining gridded inner face and an internal laminate that resists wind up to 50 mph. This fleece also insulates even when damp, dries fast and has a Durable Water Repellent finish. Shoulders have reinforced panels to withstand wear from pack straps. Drawcord hem seals in warmth; front zipper has a windflap and a chin guard. The men's REI Windbrake Thermal Fleece vest has zip hand pockets and inner drop-in pockets. Active fit provides a full range of motion; flat, nonchafing seams let you move comfortably and layer easily.
short_description: Our most wind-resistant REI-brand fleece, the men's REI Windbrake Thermal Fleece vest can handle everything from hiking to snow sports in the backcountry.
